name: @mario-andreschak/mcp-abap-abap-adt-api
description: 1:1 wrapping of abap-adt-api into a MCP server.

tools.name: transportInfo
tools.description: Get transport information for an object source

url.description: The URL of the transport configuration.

uri.description: The URI for the transport configuration.

etag.description: The ETag for the transport configuration.

tools.name: transportSetOwner
tools.description: Sets the owner of a transport.

tools.name: transportAddUser
tools.description: Adds a user to a transport.

tools.name: systemUsers
tools.description: Retrieves a list of system users.

objectUrl.description: URL of the object to find path for

tools.name: syntaxCheckCode
tools.description: Perform ABAP syntax check with source code

tools.name: syntaxCheckCdsUrl
tools.description: Perform ABAP syntax check with CDS URL

objectUrl.description: URL of the object to lock
URL of the object to unlock

lockHandle.description: Lock handle obtained from previous lock operation

tools.name: getObjectSource
tools.description: Retrieves source code for ABAP objects

tools.name: setObjectSource
tools.description: Sets source code for ABAP objects

tools.name: deleteObject
tools.description: Deletes an ABAP object from the system

objectUrl.description: URL of the object to delete

tools.name: activateObjects
tools.description: Activate ABAP objects using object references

objects.description: JSON array of objects to activate. Each object must have adtcore:uri, adtcore:type, adtcore:name, and adtcore:parentUri properties

tools.name: activateByName
tools.description: Activate an ABAP object using name and URL

tools.name: objectRegistrationInfo
tools.description: Get registration information for an ABAP object

tools.name: validateNewObject
tools.description: Validate parameters for a new ABAP object

tools.name: nodeContents
tools.description: Retrieves the contents of a node in the ABAP repository tree.

parent_name.description: The name of the parent node.

parent_type.description: The type of the parent node.

parentnodes.description: An array of parent node IDs.

parent_tech_name.description: The technical name of the parent node.

tools.name: mainPrograms
tools.description: Retrieves the main programs for a given include.

tools.name: featureDetails
tools.description: Retrieves details for a given feature.

tools.name: collectionFeatureDetails
tools.description: Retrieves details for a given collection feature.

url.description: The URL of the collection feature.

tools.name: findCollectionByUrl
tools.description: Finds a collection by its URL.

url.description: The URL of the object to test.

flags.description: Flags for the unit test run.
Flags for the unit test evaluation.

tools.name: createTestInclude
tools.description: Creates a test include for a class.

tools.name: prettyPrinter
tools.description: Formats ABAP code using the pretty printer.

source.description: The ABAP source code to format.

tools.name: gitRepos
tools.description: Retrieves a list of Git repositories.

tools.name: gitExternalRepoInfo
tools.description: Retrieves information about an external Git repository.

tools.name: gitPullRepo
tools.description: Pulls changes from a Git repository.

tools.name: stageRepo
tools.description: Stages changes in a Git repository.

tools.name: pushRepo
tools.description: Pushes changes to a Git repository.

tools.name: remoteRepoInfo
tools.description: Retrieves information about a remote Git repository.

tools.name: switchRepoBranch
tools.description: Switches the branch of a Git repository.

create.description: Whether to create the branch if it doesn't exist.

tools.name: ddicElement
tools.description: Retrieves information about a DDIC element.

path.description: The path to the DDIC element.

getTargetForAssociation.description: Whether to get the target for association.

path.description: The path to the DDIC element.

name.description: The name of the service binding.

version.description: The version of the service binding.

name.description: The name of the service binding.

version.description: The version of the service binding.

tools.name: bindingDetails
tools.description: Retrieves details of a service binding.

index.description: The index of the service binding.

tools.name: tableContents
tools.description: Retrieves the contents of an ABAP table.

sqlQuery.description: An optional SQL query to filter the data.

rowNumber.description: The maximum number of rows to retrieve.

ddicEntityName.description: The name of the DDIC entity (table or view).

tools.name: runQuery
tools.description: Runs a SQL query on the target system.

rowNumber.description: The maximum number of rows to retrieve.

query.description: An optional query string to filter the dumps.

tools.name: debuggerListeners
tools.description: Retrieves a list of debugger listeners.

isNotifiedOnConflict.description: Whether to be notified on conflict.

parents.description: An array of parent variable names.

tools.name: debuggerChildVariables
tools.description: Retrieves child variables of a debugger variable.

url.description: The URL for step types "stepRunToLine" or "stepJumpToLine".

steptype.description: The type of step to perform.

tools.name: debuggerGoToStack
tools.description: Navigates to a specific stack entry in the debugger.

urlOrPosition.description: The URL or position of the stack entry.

tools.name: debuggerSetVariableValue
tools.description: Sets the value of a debugger variable.

value.description: The new value of the variable.

uri.description: The URI of the object to rename.

tools.name: atcCheckVariant
tools.description: Retrieves information about an ATC check variant.

variant.description: The name of the ATC check variant.

mainUrl.description: The main URL for the ATC run.

variant.description: The name of the ATC check variant.

maxResults.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve.

runResultId.description: The ID of the ATC run result.

tools.name: atcUsers
tools.description: Retrieves a list of ATC users.

tools.name: isProposalMessage
tools.description: Checks if a given object is a proposal message.

tools.name: atcContactUri
tools.description: Retrieves the contact URI for an ATC finding.

findingUri.description: The URI of the ATC finding.

tools.name: atcChangeContact
tools.description: Changes the contact for an ATC finding.

tools.name: tracesListRequests
tools.description: Retrieves a list of trace requests.

tools.name: tracesHitList
tools.description: Retrieves the hit list for a trace.

tools.name: tracesDbAccess
tools.description: Retrieves database access information for a trace.

id.description: The ID of the trace configuration.
